changeSet.author: Aleksander.shukurov@gmail.com
changeSet.comment: fill in the table "roles" with test data
changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery), count_series AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS quantity FROM series) INSERT INTO devices (model, username, inserted_date_at_utc, updated_date_at_utc, device_type_id) SELECT 'Model' || s.sery, 'User name' || s.sery, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (499 - 1) + 1)) * INTERVAL '1 day', FLOOR(RANDOM() * (cs.quantity - 1) + 1) FROM series s, count_series cs
